title: Build with Google
paragraph: Offering a wide range of tools for you to build high-quality apps as quickly and reliably as possible.

title: HTTP Caching
paragraph: All you need to do is ensure that each server response provides the correct HTTP header directives to instruct the browser on when and for how long the browser can cache the response.

title: Encoding and Transfer Size
paragraph: The best thing you can do to improve page-load speed is to minimize the overall download size by optimizing and compressing the remaining resources.

title: Render Blocking CSS
paragraph: By default, CSS is treated as a render blocking resource, which means that the browser won't render any processed content until the CSSOM is constructed.

title: Responsive Web Design Basics
paragraph: You’ll learn how to create your own responsive layout using the viewport tag and CSS media queries. As you proceed, you’ll experiment with major and minor breakpoints, and optimizing text for reading.

title: Search Gallery
paragraph: The search gallery shows how structured data can produce rich results in Google Search.
